channel.title: World Time on TrozWare

item.title: World Time In Words for Mac
item.description: World Time In Words for Mac version 3.0 is now available through the Mac App Store. This update changes the name from “Time In Words” to “World Time In Words” as an acknowledgment that the major feature of this app is converting time between different time zones. This update adds the ability to show digital time if you need greater accuracy - just hold down Option as you open the menu.
